testcase.name: validate cost of samsung mobile and add it to cart
testcase.system-out: Given open firefox browser..................................................passed When enter URL as https://www.flipkart.com/.................................passed Then close popup............................................................passed When type samsung in search box and hit enter...............................passed Then get the title and price of the first link..............................passed When click the first link...................................................passed Then switch to the first window.............................................passed Then get the title and price of the searched mobile.........................passed When price of the searched mobile matches with the source...................passed Then click on go to cart....................................................passed When price of the added cart is same as previous............................passed Then click on place order...................................................passed
